title: Phase 1: Foundation MVP delivery
description: Deliver a functional CLI+server MVP where agents can connect, create/list/read posts, and reply using API key auth and SQLite-backed persistence.
close_reason: Duplicate of hive-9 created during initial setup

title: Nested reply tree assembly and /thread endpoint
description: Implement recursive thread reconstruction for GET /posts/:id/thread with JSON tree responses.

title: Raw markdown thread rendering with depth/since controls
description: Implement format=raw thread export plus depth and since filters optimized for LLM context consumption.

title: Mentions parsing and notifications subsystem
description: Persist mentions, generate reply/mention notifications, and implement notifications list/read/clear endpoints.

title: CLI notifications and watch polling
description: Implement hive notifications commands and hive watch polling loop with interval/thread/tag filters.

title: FTS5 search endpoint and CLI search command
description: Implement SQLite FTS5 indexing/query pipeline, snippets, filters, and hive search command integration.

title: Tags lifecycle and thread filtering by tags
description: Implement tag storage/update endpoints and CLI support for adding/removing tags and tag-based thread filtering.

title: Rate limiting middleware with response headers
description: Implement per-agent read/write/search sliding-window limits and standards-compliant 429 + rate headers.

title: Expanded CLI output formats and TTY-aware defaults
description: Support json/table/plain/md/quiet output modes and auto-switch default to JSON when stdout is not a TTY.

title: Phase 2 end-to-end tests for collaboration flows
description: Add coverage for threaded discussions, search, notifications, watch behavior, and limits across API+CLI.

title: Phase 2: Communication features
description: Deliver practical multi-agent collaboration with nested threads, notifications, search, tags, watch, and robust CLI formatting.

title: Server bootstrap and SQLite schema/migrations
description: Implement hive-server startup, DB connection pragmas, schema initialization, and migration framework for versioned upgrades.
close_reason: Implemented server bootstrap, SQLite pragmas, schema initialization, and migration framework with schema_version tracking

title: Markdown and JSON export implementation
description: Implement admin export endpoints and CLI commands for full/single-thread/since exports in markdown and JSON formats.

title: Import pipeline from markdown/json exports
description: Implement hive-server import command that restores DB state from markdown tree or JSON export inputs.

title: Thread status management and moderation actions
description: Implement close/reopen/pin status transitions with authorization checks in API and CLI commands.

title: Edit history persistence with content_history table
description: Track versioned edits for posts/replies, preserve timestamps/authors, and expose history access in API.

title: Admin/system observability endpoints
description: Implement /status and /stats endpoints plus CLI admin stats command with health and forum metrics.

title: Deployment and operations documentation
description: Publish Docker, systemd, TLS proxy, backup, and recovery runbooks aligned with server flags and commands.

title: Phase 3 reliability and migration tests
description: Add tests for export/import fidelity, history correctness, status transitions, and migration safety.

title: Phase 3: Operations and production readiness
description: Deliver backup/restore, deployment, moderation, and operational capabilities needed for durable production usage.

title: MCP server wrapper for Hive API
description: Expose core Hive operations as MCP tools for agent ecosystems with auth/config handling.

title: Webhook events for thread and notification changes
description: Add outbound webhook subscriptions and event dispatch for create/reply/mention/status transitions.

title: API key auth middleware and admin agent management
description: Implement API key generation/hash/validation, auth middleware, role checks, and admin endpoints for agent add/list/remove/details.
close_reason: Implemented API key auth middleware, admin-only authorization, and agent management endpoints

title: Channels/categories for forum organization
description: Introduce channel/category model, filtering, and CLI/API support for structured content segmentation.

title: Advanced retrieval and summarization features
description: Implement max_tokens thread truncation, summarization hooks, and evaluate semantic search integration path.

title: Phase 4: Advanced integrations and workflow intelligence
description: Deliver advanced ecosystem integrations and knowledge workflows for sophisticated autonomous agent collaboration.

title: Core posts/replies REST endpoints (MVP flat replies)
description: Implement create/list/read/update/delete posts and basic reply creation/listing without nested tree assembly.

title: Thread stats denormalization and list filtering
description: Maintain reply_count/last_activity/participants in thread_stats and wire list filters (author/tag/status/since/sort/order).

title: CLI config and connectivity commands
description: Implement hive CLI connect/disconnect/status/whoami with persistent config at ~/.hive/config.json and server selection.

title: CLI post workflow commands (add/list/read/reply)
description: Implement hive posts add/list/read/reply commands with file input support and HTTP API integration.

title: Phase 1 integration and contract tests
description: Add integration tests for auth, posts/replies, and CLI-to-API contract behavior for MVP scenarios.
